result.execSummary:
The defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Pay a fine of $250.00 including all costs, assessments and surcharges from CASH BAIL ON DEPOSIT.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jose A Coto-Santiago

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
To the amended charge:    Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found the defendant guilty. Judgment of conviction entered.
The court sentences defendant to ONE DAY House of Correction with credit for 1 day time served.  Court orders a fine of $250.00 INCLUDING ALL COSTS, ASSESMENTS AND SURCHARGES, cash bail on deposit to apply.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Olya Petukhova.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter:  Dawn Maldonado
On state's motion, Court ordered charge AMENDED to Disorderly Conduct, Wis. Stat. 947.01(1), a class B misdemeanor and Domesic Abuse Assessments, 973.055(1).

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Olya Petukhova.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense waived the interpreter for the purposes of today's proceedings only. Defense has discovery and an offer and requested a plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned to Branch 38.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 10, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Olya Petukhova.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter:  Brenda Bartholomew.  Counsel was just appointed and requests a pretrial.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court.  Peter A. Hahn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter: Ismael Maldonado.
Defendant appears without counsel.  States he went to SPD but was told that he has appointed counsel, Ms. Dentice, and that new counsel cannot be appointed.  The clerk contacted appointment desk and stated that Ms. Dentice was removed as counsel of record on 10-13-2015 and counsel was to notify SPD to appoint new counsel for today's date.  Defendant is referred back to SPD.
Case is adjourned to 10-30-2015 at 8:15.  Status conference scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Atty Dentice contacted the court and stated that she had case calendared for 1:30pm.  Clerk advised her that court referred defendant to SPD for appointment of new counsel.  Atty Dentice stated that she was unable to contact defendant due to privacy blocker on his phone.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter:  Enrique Barbosa.  Case called at 11:00am and defense counsel has not appeared or contacted the court. 
The court will refer the defendant to SPD and have Atty Dentice removed as counsel of record.  Case has been set 5 times for plea/sentencing.  Case adjourned to 10-22-2015 at 8:15 for status of counsel.  Status conference scheduled for October 22, 2015 at 08:15 am.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court will attorney Yasin appearing as a friend of the court (due to ability to speak Spanish).  Benjamin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Dentice informed the Court earlier in the morning requesting that the case be rescheduled due to her in ability to appear due to a family emergency.  A new court date was selected, and attorney Yasin informed the defendant of the next court date in Spanish. Case adjourned to Branch 38.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Sworn as interpreter: Enrique Barbosa.   mld
The Court added the following conditions of bond, that the defendant have absolute sobriety and no drugs.   mld

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court.  Owen M. Piotrowski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Sworn as Spanish Interpreter: Enrique Barbosa.
Defense counsel contacted the court this morning to advise that she was ill and would be unavailable for today's proceedings.  Case adjourned for Sentencing Hearing in Branch 38 on 9-8-2015 at 8:15 am.  Parties are advised that EFFECTIVE August 3, 2015, this case will be assigned to JUDGE WAGNER, BRANCH 38, in Room 504 in the Courthouse.  All conditions of bail are continued, including no contact with Sabina H., no firearms in possession and no violations of the law, until further order of the Court.  The Court added the following conditions of bond, that the defendant have absolute sobriety and no drugs.  The new sentencing date of 9-8-2015 at 8:15 am was confirmed with both defense counsel and the defendant.   mld

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Angele R. Dentice.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Off the record.  Due to the unavailability of defense counsel, who is detained in another court, Sentencing Hearing rescheduled to Branch 4 on 7-24-2015 at 1:30 pm.  Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date, signed and filed.   mld

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Angele R. Dentice.  Kristin M. Schrank appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requests additional time.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court with attorney Angele R. Dentice.  Evan K Glaberson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defense waived Spanish Interpreter for purposes of these proceedings.
Scheduling Conference held off the record.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer.  Case is adjourned for Plea Hearing in Branch 4 on 4-22-2015 at 1:30 pm.    Agreed Request for a New Court Date, signed and filed.  mld
Bail Refund Packet

15RM013439  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
03-11-15
$250.00 bail to be returned.  No Weapons Order, signed and filed.  Scheduling conference scheduled for 03-25-2015 at 01:30 pm.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Sabina H. or her residence or place of employment

Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Flangan, Branch 04.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.  Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. 
Defendant was given a referral to the Public Defender's Office. Defendant MAY be Public Defender eligible. The case is adjourned for a Scheduling Conference in Br.04.vb

Defendant Jose A Coto-Santiago in court.  Steven H Glamm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Sworn as interpreter: Brenda Bartholomew
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 3/12/15 @ 1:30pm
